DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effects of early administration of probiotics on acceleration of enteral feeding, and on growth of very low birth weight infants, newborn infants with birth weight less than 1500g are administered Bifidobacterium bifidum twice a day.
DOC.brief_title: Early Administration of Bifidobacterium to Very Low Birth Weight Infants
DOC.criteria: Very low birth weight infant Presence of major congenital malformations
